meanings.definition: Make a thorough or dramatic change in the form, appearance, or character of.
meanings.sent1: She used paint to transform the plain wall into a colorful masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar will transform into a beautiful butterfly.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand could transform anything into a delicious treat.
meanings.sent4: His kindness could transform a gloomy day into a bright one.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise began to transform the dark sky into a canvas of vibrant colors.
